Package com.sait.capstone.itsd.covidreporting.services

Class RoleService

java.lang.Object
com.sait.capstone.itsd.covidreporting.services.RoleService
public class RoleService
extends Object
Role object handler. Performs conversion from servlet logic to database logic, such as error checking, or converting user input to matching database input
Author:
Alex Hill

  • Method Details

    • get

      public Role get​(int inputRoleID) throws Exception
      fetches a specific role from the database
      Parameters:
      inputRoleID - the unique ID of a role within the database
      Returns:
      the Role object associated with the specified ID number
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getAll

      public List<Role> getAll() throws Exception
      fetches a list of all roles within the database
      Returns:
      a list of all roles within the database
      Throws:
      Exception

    • insert

      public void insert​(String inputRoleName, boolean inputCanWrite, boolean inputCanView, boolean inputCanManage) throws Exception
      inserts a new role into the database
      Parameters:
      inputRoleID - the unique id number of a role
      inputRoleName - the name of the role
      inputCanWrite - true if the role has write permissions
      inputCanView - true if the role has view permissions
      inputCanManage - true if the role has management permissions
      Throws:
      Exception

    • update

      public void update​(int inputRoleID, String inputRoleName) throws Exception
      updates an existing role within the database
      Parameters:
      inputRoleID - the unique id number of a role
      inputRoleName - the name of a role
      Throws:
      Exception

    • delete

      public void delete​(int inputRoleID) throws Exception
      deletes a specific role from the database
      Parameters:
      inputRoleID - the unique id number of a role
      Throws:
      Exception

    • roleIDLookup

      public int roleIDLookup​(String lookupString) throws Exception
      fetches a role from the database that matches the provided lookup string
      Parameters:
      lookupString - a string that contains the name of a valid role within the system.
      Returns:
      the unique ID associated with the specified string
      Throws:
      Exception
